description.full: Halo 3: ODST returns players to familiar ground on a vital, top-secret mission. ODST’s gripping story, co-operative campaign and new multiplayer content will have Halo fans “Preparing to Drop” in Fall 2009.
description.short: Halo 3: ODST returns players to familiar ground on a vital, top-secret mission. ODST’s gripping story, co-operative campaign and new multiplayer content will have Halo fans “Preparing to Drop” in Fall 2009.
